title: "Robotic Gradient Wallpapers"
content:
ðŸ¤– Welcome to our website, where you can find a collection of amazing wallpapers featuring simple graphics of robotic arms against gradient backgrounds. Our wallpapers are perfect for anyone who loves minimalistic designs and futuristic themes.

ðŸ’» Whether you're looking to decorate your desktop, laptop, or mobile device, we have a variety of resolutions and sizes available to fit your needs. Our wallpapers are high-quality and optimized for various screen sizes, so you can enjoy a crisp and clear image no matter what device you're using.

ðŸŽ¨ Our wallpapers feature a range of complementary colors in beautiful gradients, making them not only functional but also aesthetically pleasing. With a diverse selection of colors to choose from, you're sure to find a wallpaper that matches your personal style.

ðŸš€ So why wait? Browse our collection today and give your device a fresh new look with our stunning robotic gradient wallpapers!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a robot arm, against a gradient background of two complementary colors."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
